thread.title: Excellent and friendly hotel with quirky rooms and great self service breakfast
thread.title_full: Excellent and friendly hotel with quirky rooms and great self service breakfast - Review of Hotel Crayon Rouge by Elegancia, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Dean M
title: Excellent and friendly hotel with quirky rooms and great self service breakfast
text: Stayed here for 2 nights in the room with the jacuzzi bath, from the moment we arrived could not fault the hotel, very friendly and helpful staff, with very quirky rooms and a great help yourself breakfast, also a good honesty bar with wines beer and soft drinks, this is a very relaxed, small, friendly hotel and will definitely be back.
